# key

**Type Property**

The key used to retrieve an error string from an error object’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSError/userInfo] dictionary.

## Declaration

```swift
static let key: MTKModelError
```

## Constants

- **domain**: The error domain used by MetalKit when returning mesh initialization errors.

items.description: The error domain used by MetalKit when returning mesh initialization errors.
items.name: domain

title: key
